trans-unit.source: Represents an asymmetric key for X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: 表示 X.509 憑證的非對稱金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509AsymmetricSecurityKey"></xref> class using the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509AsymmetricSecurityKey"></xref>類別使用指定的 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> that represents the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> ，代表 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: Decrypts the specified encrypted key using the specified cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 解密指定的加密的金鑰，使用指定的密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl> fields to specify the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url>或<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl>欄位，即可指定演算法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url>

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm to decrypt the key.
trans-unit.target: 要解密金鑰的密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Byte>包含加密的金鑰。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the decrypted key.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Byte>包含解密的金鑰。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate specified in the constructor does not have a private key.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式中指定的 X.509 憑證沒有私密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: -or- The X.509 certificate has a private key, but it was not generated using the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: -或-X.509 憑證有私密金鑰，但它並非使用<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref>演算法。

trans-unit.source: -or- The X.509 certificate has a private key, it was generated using the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref> algorithm, but the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.KeyExchangeAlgorithm*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -或-X.509 憑證有私密金鑰，產生使用<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref>演算法，但<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.KeyExchangeAlgorithm*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.KeyExchangeAlgorithm*>

trans-unit.source: -or- The algorithm parameter is not supported.
trans-unit.target: -或- algorithm 不支援參數。

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url"></xref> and <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 支援的演算法為<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url"></xref>和<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Encrypts the specified encrypted key using the specified cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 加密指定的加密的金鑰，使用指定的密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl> fields to specify the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url>或<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl>欄位，即可指定演算法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url>

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm to encrypt the key.
trans-unit.target: 要加密金鑰的密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the key to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Byte>，其中包含要加密的金鑰。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Byte>包含加密的金鑰。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate specified in the constructor has a public key that was not generated using the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式中指定的 X.509 憑證具有不使用產生的公開金鑰<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref>演算法。

trans-unit.source: -or- The algorithm parameter is not supported.
trans-unit.target: -或- algorithm 不支援參數。

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url"></xref> and <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 支援的演算法為<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url"></xref>和<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified asymmetric cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定的非對稱密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> fields to specify the `algorithm` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>， <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url>， <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl>，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url>或<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature>欄位，即可指定`algorithm`參數。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>

trans-unit.source: The asymmetric algorithm to create.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立非對稱演算法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when a private key is required to create the algorithm; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>何時需要私密金鑰來建立演算法。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"></xref> that represents the specified asymmetric cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"> </xref>表示指定的非對稱密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: privateKey is and the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor does not have a private key.
trans-unit.target: privateKey是而且建構函式中指定的 X.509 憑證沒有私密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: -or- algorithm is and the public or private key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type .
trans-unit.target: -algorithm是和建構函式中指定的 X.509 憑證的公用或私用索引鍵不是類型 。

trans-unit.source: -or- algorithm is , , or and the public or private key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type .
trans-unit.target: -algorithm是 ， ， 或和建構函式中指定的 X.509 憑證的公用或私用索引鍵不是類型 。

trans-unit.source: -or- algorithm is not supported.
trans-unit.target: -或-algorithm不支援。

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl"></xref>, <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url"></xref>, <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl"></xref>, <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url"></xref>, and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl"></xref>, <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url"></xref>, <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl"></xref>, <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url"></xref>, and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a cryptographic algorithm that generates a hash for a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 取得產生數位簽章之雜湊的密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> fields to specify the `algorithm` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url>或<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature>欄位，即可指定`algorithm`參數。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm"></xref> that generates hashes for digital signatures.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm"> </xref> ，產生數位簽章的雜湊。

trans-unit.source: algorithm is not supported.
trans-unit.target: algorithm不支援。

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl"></xref>, <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url"></xref>, and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 支援的演算法為<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url"> </xref>，和<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 取得數位簽章的變形項演算法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> fields to specify the `algorithm` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url>或<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature>欄位，即可指定`algorithm`參數。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>

trans-unit.source: The de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature to get an instance of.
trans-unit.target: 要取得的執行個體之數位簽章變形項演算法。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter"></xref> that represents the de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter"> </xref> ，表示數位簽章的變形項演算法。

trans-unit.source: algorithm is and the public key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type .
trans-unit.target: algorithm是和建構函式中指定的 X.509 憑證的公開金鑰不是類型 。

trans-unit.source: -or- algorithm is or and the public key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type .
trans-unit.target: -algorithm為或和建構函式中指定的 X.509 憑證的公開金鑰不是類型 。

trans-unit.source: -or- algorithm is not supported.
trans-unit.target: -或-algorithm不支援。

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl"></xref>, <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url"></xref>, and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 支援的演算法為<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url"> </xref>，和<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 取得數位簽章的格式器演算法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> fields to specify the `algorithm` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url>或<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature>欄位，即可指定`algorithm`參數。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>

trans-unit.source: The formatter algorithm for the digital signature to get an instance of.
trans-unit.target: 要取得的執行個體之數位簽章格式器演算法。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter"></xref> that represents the formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter"> </xref> ，表示數位簽章的格式器演算法。

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate specified in the constructor does not have a private key.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式中指定的 X.509 憑證沒有私密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: -or- algorithm is and the private key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type .
trans-unit.target: - algorithm 是和建構函式中指定的 X.509 憑證的私密金鑰不是類型 。

trans-unit.source: -or- algorithm is or and the private key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type .
trans-unit.target: - algorithm 是或和建構函式中指定的 X.509 憑證的私密金鑰不是類型 。

trans-unit.source: -or- algorithm is not supported.
trans-unit.target: - algorithm 不支援。

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl"></xref>, <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url"></xref>, and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 支援的演算法為<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url"> </xref>，和<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the private key is a available.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否可使用私密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the private key is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>當私密金鑰，則可使用;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm uses asymmetric keys.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出指定的演算法是否會使用非對稱金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the specified algorithm is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.DsaSha1Signature"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaOaepKeyWrap"></xref>, or <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaV15KeyWrap"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>when the specified algorithm is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.DsaSha1Signature"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaOaepKeyWrap"></xref>, or <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaV15KeyWrap"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm is supported by this class.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個類別是否支援指定的演算法。

trans-unit.source: The IsSupportedAlgorithm method returns `true` when one of the following is true: - The `algorithm` parameter is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl> and the public key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is of type <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>.
trans-unit.target: IsSupportedAlgorithm 方法會傳回`true`下列其中之一為真時:-`algorithm`參數是<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>在建構函式中指定的 X.509 憑證的公開金鑰是型別<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>

trans-unit.source: - The `algorithm` parameter is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> and the public key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is of type <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>.
trans-unit.target: -`algorithm`參數是<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url><xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl>、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url>或<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature>，而且建構函式中指定的 X.509 憑證的公開金鑰的類型<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url>

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the specified algorithm is <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl"></xref>, <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url"></xref>, <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl"></xref>, <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url"></xref>, or <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature"></xref> and the public key is of the right type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的演算法是<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url"> </xref>，或<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature"></xref>而且公開金鑰的類型正確，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: See the remarks for details.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 < 備註 > 以取得詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm uses symmetric keys.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出指定的演算法是否會使用對稱金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the specified algorithm is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.HmacSha1Signature"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesEncryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128KeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192KeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256KeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesKeyWrap"></xref>, or <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Psha1KeyDerivation"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>when the specified algorithm is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.HmacSha1Signature"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesEncryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128KeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192KeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256KeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesKeyWrap"></xref>, or <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Psha1KeyDerivation"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size, in bits, of the public key associated with the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 取得大小，以位元，與 X.509 憑證相關聯的公開金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The size, in bits, of the public key associated with the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 大小，以位元為單位的公開金鑰的 X.509 憑證相關聯。
